title: There is one thing I am concerned of when I am going to begin streaming.
body: How do I get on facecam, I figured out everything else except that.

replies.body: What do you mean, "get on" a facecam? You connect a camera and point it at your face.
I meant to get it on screen.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Apex,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=gEj2d4K2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-03T04:40:13.122+0000)
>
> I meant to get it on screen.

Add the device as a source, like anything else.
